project_goal_qna_q: What is the goal of this project?
project_goal_qna_a: To implement a working server and support all the game's original features to the best of our abilities.
feature_x_qna_q: When will X feature be implemented?
feature_x_qna_a: When we get around to it. This project has a small team working on this in their spare time so please be patient.
working_features_qna_a: Look at Vincento's diagram which lists what currently works or my PDF guide which also lists the same.
why_small_lobbies_qna_q: Why are the lobbies so small/infrequent?
why_small_lobbies_qna_a:
Players are from around the world so schedules don't always line up. We also have free will to both play and not play the game.
This project was best described as a pick up football game rather than a professional league.
i_have_bug_qna_q: I have a bug/problem launching the game!
i_have_bug_qna_a: The PDF guide has solutions to common problems so it's best to start there. If you're still having an issue, post the information in #bug-report and someone can try and help.
can_dw_through_steam_qna_q: Can I download this through Steam?
can_dw_through_steam_qna_a: The project requires a specific version. Ivy's instructions have a link to the correct version.
can_have_src_code_qna_q: Can I have the lobby source code so I can host my own?
can_have_src_code_qna_a: No and there are no plans to do so.
err_cmd_available_list_desc: List of error codes you can input into the 'code' parameter of the command.
errcode_-3_res_desc: This typically means that you do not have the right game files.
errcode_-3_option_0: Check you have downloaded the files from the Google Drive linked in the Getting Started guide rather than from Steam
errcode_-3_option_1: The game files and launcher are **not** on Desktop or My Documents. These locations have special permissions that can cause issues.
errcode_-99_res_desc: The error means you have a corrupted DAT file that's downloaded from the server when you connect
errcode_-99_option_0: Check if you can access https://analytics.fa-emu.com/. It runs on the game server.
errcode_-99_option_1: Restart your PC to free up any processes accessing the files.
errcode_-99_option_2: Add a folder wide exception for the game that tells the AV to ignore the folders where you have the launcher and game files.
errcode_-99_option_3: Check your firewall exceptions are both ways
errcode_-99_option_4: Ensure the game files aren't in a system folder. Make sure they're in a separate folder
errcode_-99_option_5: If the firewall exceptions on the AV aren't enough, add exceptions to the router too.
errcode_-15_res_desc: This is typically related to network traffic being blocked.
errcode_-15_option_0: Check you have the latest version of the launcher from #server-status
errcode_-15_option_1: Add m_serverIp=137.184.201.52 to the bottom of your config.ini file in the folder containing the launcher.
errcode_-15_option_2: Check if your anti-virus is blocking the network traffic. If it is, add an exception for GAME.exe allowing the network traffic through.
errcode_-13_res_desc: If the server is not down, this is typically related to network traffic being blocked.
errcode_-13_option_0: Check if the Operator bot is online and use the /ping command in the #bot channel. The Operator runs on the game server so if it is down, it won't respond.
errcode_-13_option_1: Check you have the latest version of the launcher from #server-status
errcode_-13_option_2: Add m_serverIp=137.184.201.52 (or whatever the current address is) to the bottom of your config.ini file in the folder containing the launcher.
errcode_-13_option_3: Check if your anti-virus is blocking the network traffic. If it is, add an exception for GAME.exe allowing the network traffic through.
errcode_-16_res_desc: This is a network error most often seen on Fritz Boxes and Vodafone routers.
errcode_-16_option_0: Check if your anti-virus is blocking the network connection.
errcode_-16_option_1: If your anti-virus is blocking the connection, add an exception for GAME.exe in your anti-virus allowing the network traffic through.
errcode_-16_option_2: Check if your router is blocking the network connection.
errcode_-16_option_3: If your router is blocking the connection, add a rule to allow two-way communication to the server IP. See #server status for the current IP.
errcode_-98_res_desc: The error means you have a corrupted DAT file that's downloaded from the server when you connect.
errcode_-98_option_0: Check if you can access https://analytics.fa-emu.com/. It runs on the game server.
errcode_-98_option_1: Restart your PC to free up any processes accessing the files.
errcode_-98_option_2: Add a folder wide exception for the game that tells the AV to ignore the folders where you have the launcher and game files.
errcode_-98_option_3: Check your firewall exceptions are both ways
errcode_-98_option_4: Ensure the game files aren't in a system folder. Make sure they're in a separate folder
errcode_-98_option_5: If the firewall exceptions on the AV aren't enough, add exceptions to the router too.
faq_description: A list of the questions often asked by players.
